code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{LoadScript,DistanceMatrixService}from"@react-google-maps/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DistanceCalculator=()=>{const[distance,setDistance]=useState("");const[duration,setDuration]=useState("");const handleCallback=response=>{if(response.rows[0].elements[0].status==="OK"){setDistance(response.rows[0].elements[0].distance.text);setDuration(response.rows[0].elements[0].duration.text);}else{setDistance("Distance not available");setDuration("Duration not available");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LoadScript,{googleMapsApiKey:"YOUR_API_KEY",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DistanceMatrixService,{options:{origins:["New York, NY"],destinations:["Los Angeles, CA"],travelMode:"DRIVING"},callback:handleCallback}),distance&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Distance: ",distance,", Duration: ",duration]})]});};export default DistanceCalculator;
